latest:
**Critical**: New 0-day vulnerability revealed allowing account takeover and access to all Zendesk tickets [6][7]

**Latest**: End User Separation EAP for department spaces [2], automated ticket redaction via triggers [3], release notes through 2025-08-22 [5]

**Meanwhile**: Former Zendesk HQ headed to auction following 80% drop in valuation [1][4]
weekly:
**Critical**: Service incident affecting adherence feature in GCP since July 25, 2025; service incident affecting assignments in Zendesk QA since August 04, 2025; service incident affecting Zendesk Sales performance since July 31, 2025.

**This week**: TTEC and Zendesk team up to deliver AI-driven customer experience solutions; Zendesk announces enhanced dynamic filtering for lookup relationships, API support for WhatsApp Flows, import enhancements for Exchange and Gmail connectors, move of Zendesk QA user and license management to Zendesk Admin Center; Zendesk schedules database maintenance for Zendesk Sales (Sell) on September 9, 2025.
monthly:
**Critical**: Service Incident - August 18, 2025 - Zendesk QA - QA access issues & 5xx errors

**This month**: Announcing the new external Oauth page in Admin Center, Announcing the excluded terms enhancement to AI-generated translations, Zendesk Boosts Customer Support Efficiency with GPT-5 Integration, Zendesk Expands to Meet Rising AI-Driven Demand, Zendesk's Adoption of Outcome-based Pricing Model

**Meanwhile**: Why Andreessen and Bain Backed a Self-Described 'Zendesk Killer', Beyond the bot: a blueprint for people-first automation, Zendesk CTO on the new era of customer experience, US firm Zendesk ups LatAm investments to capture momentum in AI agents

release_notes.summary: Copilot: auto assist can now suggest existing macros to agents. AI Agents Advanced: improved dialogue builder UI for hiding/disabling parameter branches.

article.title: Release notes through 2025-08-22
article.description:
See our What's New for an overview of what was released last month.This week's release notes include:
Copilot
AI Agents Advanced
App Marketplace
Products with no updates this week
